statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, total_amount FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, product_name FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE total_amount > 100.00 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, total_amount FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, total_amount FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' AND purchase_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, total_amount FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE total_amount > 1000 AND quantity > 3;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE product_name = 'Laptop' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT AVG(total_amount) AS avg_total_amount, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 5 ORDER BY avg_total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, amount FROM purchases WHERE amount > 100.00;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL AND customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM purchases WHERE amount > 1000) ORDER BY customer_name LIMIT 5;

SELECT customer_name, phone_number, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM customers LEFT JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchases > 3 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount < 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT p.product_name, p.price, o.total_amount FROM products p JOIN orders o ON p.product_id = o.order_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_date FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, email FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT p.product_name, p.price, c.category_name FROM products p JOIN categories c ON p.product_id = c.category_id;
SELECT c.*, p.product_name FROM categories c LEFT JOIN products p ON c.category_id = p.product_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, age, city FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, city FROM customers ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, city FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York' AND age < 40;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT p.product_name, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchases pr JOIN products p ON pr.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY p.product_name;

SELECT c.customer_name, SUM(pr.quantity * p.price) AS total_spent FROM customers c JOIN purchases pr ON c.customer_id = pr.customer_id JOIN products p ON pr.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY c.customer_name ORDER BY total_spent DESC LIMIT 5;
